alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes; Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 3:01PM CDT until June 20 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BOX BUTTE...SOUTHWESTERN DAWES AND NORTHEASTERN SIOUX COUNTIES... At 201 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northeast of Agate Bed National Monument, or 38 miles southwest of Chadron, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Crawford, Agate Bed National Monument, Fort Robinson Campground and Fort Robinson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
